source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_config_db.main_pipeline_config
USING delta
AS
SELECT
    1 AS System_key
    ,CAST('Horizon' AS VARCHAR(500)) AS System_name
    ,CAST('Relevant Reps' AS VARCHAR(500)) AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    2 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Relevant Reps' AS Object
    ,'nsip-representation' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    3 AS System_key
    ,CAST('Horizon' AS VARCHAR(500)) AS System_name
    ,CAST('nsip project' AS VARCHAR(500)) AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    4 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'nsip project' AS Object
    ,'nsip-project' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled

UNION ALL
SELECT
    5 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'service user' AS Object
    ,'service-user' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled

UNION ALL
SELECT
    6 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'case involvement' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    7 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'nsip project update' AS Object
    ,'nsip-project-update' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    8 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'nsip exam timetable' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    9 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'nsip subscription' AS Object
    ,'nsip-subscription' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    10 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'s51 advice' AS Object
    ,'s51-advice' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    11 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'nsip s51 advice' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    12 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Folder' AS Object
    ,'folder' AS entity_name
    ,FALSE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    13 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'Folder' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    14 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Document metadata' AS Object
    ,'nsip-document' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    15 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'Document metadata' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    16 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'nsip exam timetable' AS Object
    ,'nsip-exam-timetable' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    17 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'Appeals Events' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    18 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Appeals Events' AS Object
    ,'appeal-event' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    19 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Appeals Has' AS Object
    ,'appeal-has' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    20 AS System_key
    ,'HR' AS System_name
    ,'Entraid' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    21 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'s62a vc' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    22 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'Appeal Document Metadata' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    23 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Appeal Document' AS Object
    ,'appeal-document' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    24 AS System_key
    ,'Horizon' AS System_name
    ,'Appeals Folder' AS Object
    ,CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(500)) AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    25 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Appeal S78' AS Object
    ,'appeal-s78' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    26 AS System_key
    ,'Listed Buildings' AS System_name
    ,'Listed Buildings' AS Object
    ,'listed-buildings' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled
UNION ALL
SELECT
    27 AS System_key
    ,'Service bus' AS System_name
    ,'Appeal Representation' AS Object
    ,'appeal-representation' AS entity_name
    ,TRUE AS is_enabled

%%sql

SELECT DISTINCT
                Entity_name
            FROM
                odw_config_db.main_pipeline_config
            WHERE
                System_name = 'Service bus'
